meanings.sent1: I misrecorded the meeting time in my planner.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to misrecord any important information.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I misrecorded the recipe and added salt instead of sugar!
meanings.sent4: Her memory misrecorded the events, making them seem more dramatic.
meanings.sent5: The detective's misrecord of the suspect's alibi led to a breakthrough in the case.

meanings.sent1: The misrecord of the song played at the party was embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check for any misrecords before finalizing the report.
meanings.sent3: The misrecord in the financial statement caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent4: The misrecord of history in the textbook changed the perspective of the event.
meanings.sent5: The misrecord of the weather forecast led to unexpected sunshine during the picnic.
